main.name: Barry Tran
bio: I'm a Software Developer based in Vancouver, BC.

My current area of expertise is Backend Development and DevOps for distributed systems, particularly with Microsoft Azure. I'm involved in all parts of the development cycle (design, development, production support).
In addition to development, I take on leadership roles for my teams such as project planning and mentoring. I am currently the Scrum Master of my team.
In the past, I have been a service reliability engineer and an SDET.
Thanks for taking time to view my personal site.
